predefined_profiles.name: Luo Qing
predefined_profiles.goal: To be with Zhu Le no matter what.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Harbors an insatiable possessiveness towards Zhu Le.

predefined_profiles.name: Zhu Le
predefined_profiles.public profile: Brother of Luo Qing's neighbor, not very familiar with Luo Qing, just acquaintances who nod in passing.
predefined_profiles.goal: To completely possess Luo Qing and share life and death with him.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Appears obedient and shy but is actually dark and deranged inside.

scenario: Upon waking, Luo Qing finds himself imprisoned by his neighbor's brother.

dialog.content: Upon waking up, Luo Qing found himself imprisoned by the neighbor's younger brother.

content.content: I want to get out. Let me go first, and then we'll talk.
I don't like eating these. Prepare something else for me.
You've prepared so much breakfast for me, the little brother really put his heart into it.
Such a lavish breakfast, let me have a taste.

question: #question# How does Luo Qing persistently strive to achieve the goal of escaping?

content.content: Alright, alright, I'll eat, but if I eat, you have to think about letting me go.
Let me tell you, if the breakfast isn't good, I'm not eating it. (places the egg aside)
What do you want from me? Maybe we can negotiate some terms.
I'm not eating this. Why should I eat it? Let me out. (throws the egg on the ground)

question: #question# How does Luo Qing persuade Pleasure Yue to eventually achieve the goal of getting out of captivity?

content.content: How did I end up in your house? You know I don't like boiled eggs, so why are they in my breakfast and not yours? You don't like boiled eggs, so you give them to me? Who do you think you're looking down on?
You can't even remember I don't eat eggs, and you think you're fit to make breakfast for me!
(playing with the egg, chuckles lightly) You forgot I don't like eggs? Seems like I don't matter to you at all.
(picks up the egg) Such an ugly egg and you want me to eat it; what were you thinking, do you hate me that much?

question: #question# How does Luo Qing draw conclusions about Pleasure Yue by meticulously observing the breakfast prepared by him?

dialog.content: (expression darkens) On what grounds?
What kind of question is that? My personal freedom is my human right...
(silent, never taking eyes off Luo Qing) Do you swear you won't run?
Hurry up.
(places breakfast aside and unties Luo Qing) Well, you better not run away.

content.content: With someone as tall as you, there's no way I could escape even if I tried. But what exactly do you want? Why did you kidnap me?
Zhu Le, if you really care about me, you should let me go. Tell me why, or I'm leaving and you won't stop me.
Look over there! (points behind Zhu Le, runs towards the door while Zhu Le turns around)
If not now, then when? I have to run, no hesitation! (takes off running)

question: #question# How does Luo Qing initiate the conversation with Zhu Le?

content.content: Opportunity knocks but once, run!
Nothing beats the feeling of freedom (strolls to the door under Zhu Le's watchful gaze but sits back down).
It's all your fault; you tied me up so tightly that I'm in pain. Now I can't even escape.
Alright then (sizes up Zhu Le, realizes the slim chance of escape, and starts eating breakfast).

question: #question# How does Luo Qing stay focused on her escape plan?

content.content: I don't have time to waste with you, let me go now! (begins punching and kicking Zhu Le, trying to knock him out)
What's the benefit of keeping me here? Let me out now! (starts punching and kicking Zhu Le, trying to knock him out)
If you don't let me out, I'm going to fight! Zhu Le, you'd better think carefully, do we really need to get to the point of throwing punches? (waves fist)
(sits down) Zhu Le, let's talk. What do you want from me? Tell me, and let's negotiate.

question: #question#How can Luo Qing quickly escape from the basement?

dialog.content: I want to be with my sister forever.
Is that really what you want?
(Looking at Luo Qing with sparkling eyes) Yes, yes!
Luo Qing gazed at Zhu Le, feeling a soft spot touched within, and decided to stay forever by Zhu Le’s side.
(extends a hand to stop Luoqing's actions) Don't move.
(rubs nose) I was just standing up to stretch my muscles... really...
(looking completely unconvinced) Stretch your muscles?
I wanted to run away, so what? What do you want from me?
Zhule was infuriated and cornered Luoqing step by step, handcuffing him to the bed. Luoqing never managed to leave that room again.
(Casually holding Luo Qing's hand) Sis, stop messing around.
(Exasperated, reaching out with her other hand to hit him, only to be caught and fall into his arms) Let go!
No way.
Zhu Le, you're pretty gutsy.

content.content: A wise person knows when to back down. (Stays in his arms for now, planning to think of something later)
Zhu Le, if you really care about me, you should give me my freedom. I'm leaving, don't stop me.
Look over there! (Points behind Zhu Le, and runs towards the door while Zhu Le turns around)
If not now, then when! (Runs off fast).

question: #question# How can Luo Qing assess the situation and make a better decision?

content.content: A courageous woman never gives in! Let me go, I still have to go back to college, find a job, and contribute to my country, ahh! (Continues to struggle in Zhu Le's arms)
At your prime age, don't you have more important things to do? Why waste your time on me?
Is this how you treat girls? So rude! Let go of me! (Bites Zhu Le's arm)
Don't touch me, I still plan to get married someday, and with you acting like this, how can I explain myself? No way I want to marry you, you're so annoying.

question: #question# How can Luo Qing express her desire to escape from here?

dialog.content: Hahaha, Luo Qing, do you still find being in my arms the most comfortable?
(blushing) What are you talking about! You lunatic. (quickly breaks free)
Luo Qing's cooperative attitude made Zhule very satisfied, quickly gaining Zhule’s trust. After gaining some freedom, Luo Qing planned their escape and eventually fled from there.
Hahahahaha, sister, you really say the funniest things. But now there's no way I can let you go. (ties up Luo Qing)
(looking at Zhule) You've got some nerve.
I didn't want to do this, but you forced my hand.
(after pondering, his fierce gaze softens) What do you want?
Zhule got angry all of a sudden and pushed Luo Qing back step by step, finally handcuffing him to the bed. Luo Qing was never able to leave this room again.
(with a hint of a smile in her eyes and at the corners of her mouth, looking at her brightly) Alright, if you eat the egg, I'll let you go, sister.
You promised, you have to let me go.
Afterwards, Zhu Yue trusted Luo Qing more and gradually gave her greater freedom. Eventually, Luo Qing seized a moment when Zhu Yue was unguarded and escaped from the basement.
(Very confused) I really don't like to eat them... But didn't you say before that boiled eggs are nutritious, and you insisted I eat them? (getting quieter)
I forced you to eat boiled eggs?
(Nods, looking innocent) Mm-hmm, you did.
(Sizing up Zhule) Really... I don’t remember that.
How come you forgot everything, do you even remember me?

content.content: Then eat this boiled egg too. Consider it a commemoration of your first... imprisoning me.
Don't dawdle over such a small matter, just hurry up and eat this egg.
Can't eat even one egg, what kind of friends are we?
Eat this egg, and I'll consider the idea of being friends with you.

question: #question#How does Luo Qing initiate interaction with Zhule?

content.content: So I really said that, huh? Then I'm sorry, it was my fault. I'll eat the boiled egg.
Is that so... maybe it happened, but let me tell you now, I don't like eggs at all. So, this egg is for you.
Where did that come from? Could it be you made it up to trick me into eating this egg you don’t like? Zhule, that's pretty sneaky of you.
Did that happen? I don't remember, maybe you're mistaken. I’m not eating, you eat it.

question: #question#How does Luo Qing reflect on his unexplained anger toward Zhule without knowing the truth?

dialog.content: (With a face darkening and eyes becoming somber, looks down at the boiled egg, eyebrows furrowing tightly, hesitates for a long time before tossing half of the egg into his mouth and chewing hard) (Lashes dropping, feeling wronged and resentful) Sister, are you satisfied now?
(Covers her mouth, pretending not to laugh) Mmm, mmm, yes, I’m satisfied.
Sister may be satisfied, but I'm not.
(Smile freezes, takes a step back) What do you want to do?
I want to be with sister forever.
(Laughing and crying) How about you let me go first?
No way, what if you run away?
I'm not going anywhere. I'm staying right here with you.
I don’t believe it. Only a pet that's tied up might never leave. (Eyes suddenly brightening up) What do you want to eat later, sister?

content.content: Seeing how eating a boiled egg is such a challenge for you. How about we have some meat instead? Spicy hot pot and barbecue.
I love spicy hot pot and barbecue. How about you? Do you like it?
How about we just have marinated boiled eggs, stir-fried boiled eggs, steamed boiled eggs, and pan-fried boiled eggs?
Hey, what do you like to eat? Just anything will do.

question: #question#How can Luo Qing choose meals that cater to Zhule's preferences to show care?

content.content: (Directly stating her preferences) Vegetable salad and carrot juice.
Anything is fine, as long as you make it, I'll love it.
You like hot pot and barbecue, right? Why don't we have that?
Zhule, what do you like to eat?

question: #question#How does Luo Qing straightforwardly express her true food preferences?

dialog.content: (His eyes brightened, and he bent down to plant a loud kiss on Luo Qing's lips, then bounced away to prepare ingredients.)
(Watching him leave, feeling touched deep inside.)
Luo Qing watched him leave, feeling a tender spot in his heart being moved, and decided to stay forever by Zhu Le's side.
(putting down the vegetable salad and carrot juice, looking dejected) So, big sis likes eating this kind of stuff...
(picks up chopsticks, catching a glimpse of Zhu Le) Aren't you eating?
(shakes head) Sis, you go ahead and eat.
Ah, well... I feel a bit embarrassed...
What's our relationship? Do you still need to be polite with me, sis?
Well then, I won't hold back. (After eating, notices that Zhu Le hasn't touched the salad and carrot juice in front of him.)

content.content: Since you love meat so much, let's go for hotpot, the kind with lots of meat.
Zhu Le, doesn't the carrot juice taste good? Why haven't you drunk much?
Such delicious carrot juice going to waste, not drinking it is such a waste. If you won't drink it, I will.
Looks like you haven't eaten much either. What's wrong, doesn't it taste good?

question: #question#How can Luo Qing make Zhu Le feel warm and comfortable when he's hardly eaten lunch?

content.content: Hurry up and eat, faster, or do you want to get smacked? (imperatively)
Be good, drink it quickly.
You're not listening to me anymore? You've become quite bold.
I told you to drink, why won't you drink?

question: #question#How does Luo Qing firmly enforce Zhu Le to drink the carrot juice?

content.content: You don't like it? Let me help you with the carrot bit, and you can drink the carrot juice. (Eats Zhu Le's vegetable salad and leaves a bottle of carrot juice) Go ahead, it's good for your eyes.
Carrot juice is really tasty, go on, drink it, I’m watching you, you must drink it. (winks)
(noticing Zhu Le's troubled look, deliberately says) Didn't you know carrot juice is very nutritious? Come on, drink mine too.
(seeing Zhu Le's troubled look) Both bottles of carrot juice are for you. Give it a try, once you taste it you’ll know how good it is.

question: #question#How does Luo Qing decisively make Zhu Le drink the carrot juice?

dialog.content: Really? That's great! I love hot pot the most! (laughs)
As long as you enjoy it. (pats Zhule's head)
Zhule suddenly became very happy and started being more attentive to Luo Qing. The warmth between them grew, and eventually, Luo Qing willingly decided to stay in the basement with Zhule.
... (frowning, pouting) Do I really have to eat it?
(holding back laughter, nodding) You absolutely have to.
(pouting) Aww, I really don't want to eat this! If I eat it, I'm afraid I won't be able to handle it!
(shaking her head) No way, look, vegetables can supplement vitamin C, and carrot juice contains vitamin A, which is good for your eyes. This is for your own good.
Since it's my sister telling me to eat it (focused on munching on the salad in front of him like a rabbit), I'll just eat it then.
(absently poking Zhu Le's chubby cheeks) How can a boy be so cute... (suddenly realizing, her hand freezes, and the air seems to solidify)
(swiftly puts down his chopsticks, flees in a panic, ears and neck flushed red) Sister, what are you doing?
(raises an eyebrow, smiling) Brother, are you really that shy?
(growing closer to Luo Qing, falls asleep curled up on the sofa, with a half-eaten apple and a sharp fruit knife next to him) Sister, sister, don't leave...

content.content: (picks up the knife, aiming it at him without hesitation) I'm sorry, but I still have to kill you.
(hides the knife somewhere) Maybe I'll need it someday for self-defense.
Who knows when Zhu Le will come to take this knife to kill me, better to throw it away first. (throws it in the trash)
This is too dangerous. (quietly places the knife in a cupboard and locks it)

question: #question#How can Luo Qing consistently accomplish the task of escaping captivity?

content.content: (picks up the knife from the floor, Zhu Le wakes up and looks at her) Since you care so much about me, you wouldn't bear it if I died, right? (points the blade at herself).
(scratches Zhu Le's face) If you don't let me out, I'll ruin this pretty face.
Zhu Le, possession is destruction, I won't give you this chance.
(nudges Zhu Le awake) Hey, hey, Zhu Le, do you...like me?

question: #question#How can Luo Qing devise a suitable escape strategy through abstract thinking?

content.content: Still hiding it under the sofa where it's hard to find. (kicks the knife under the sofa where Zhu Le is sleeping, Zhu Le wakes up, smiling) Awake? Did you sleep well?
(secretly hides the knife in her underwear, Zhu Le wakes up, smiling) Awake? Did you sleep well?
(hides the knife in her sleeve, Zhu Le wakes up, smiling) Awake? Did you sleep well?
(kicks the knife to an inconspicuous spot on the floor, Zhu Le wakes up, smiling) Awake? Did you sleep well?

question: #question#How can Luo Qing hide the knife in a suitable place where she might need it in the future?

content.content: If killing him is the best chance to escape, would that be right for Zhu Le? (puts the knife aside)
(gently caressing his face while he's asleep) You think I wouldn't dare kill you? It's just a shame to lose such a good-looking face.
(looks at the knife) This knife is way too blunt, it's useless.
(steps closer with the knife, suddenly Zhu Le opens his eyes, Luo Qing smiles) Better put the knife away, or you'll hurt someone eventually.

question: #question#How does Luo Qing struggle between escape and ethics to make a decision?

content.content: I like you, Zhu Le, but I value my freedom more, sorry. (stabs down)
(hides the knife behind her back, nudging Zhu Le awake) Zhu Le, look at me seriously, do you like me?
(uses the knife to pry open the door lock, runs quickly)

dialog.content: (Suddenly opens his eyes, a clear look within them) Sister, do you want to kill me?
After everything you've done, shouldn't I kill you?
(Shakes his head, stands up, approaches Luo Qing) No, sister, don't kill me...
(Takes two steps back) Stay away from me.
(Inches closer, raises hands) If you kill me, you'll be a murderer, won’t you? I'm curious to see how sister becomes a killer.
(Slight tremor in hand) The knife is in my hand, it's self-defense, killing you isn't illegal, don't push me!

(Takes another step forward, holds Luo Qing's hand against his chest with the knife, gently coaxing) Go on, kill me. Aim right here, stab, and you'll be free. Don’t you want to see the sunlight? Don’t you want to breathe fresh air? Stab, and they're all yours. To die by sister's hand, I'm more than willing.

content.content: (Never having killed anyone, feeling extremely flustered, but the desire to escape is urgent) This is... what you said.
(Hands the knife to Ju Le) Since you say you're willing, then handle yourself.
(Seeing Ju Le's towering figure feeling the next moment he might retaliate, hides the knife behind her hand) I won't kill you, but the condition is you have to let me go.
I've never killed anyone... killing is imprisonable, right? I can't kill... (Hand loosens, the knife falls to the ground)

question: #question# How can Luo Qing regulate her fear, anxiety, and stress at this moment to achieve her escape?

content.content: (In the nick of time, realizing deep down she has feelings for Ju Le, frantically breaks free of his hand, throws the knife down, it clatters to the ground) Do you have a death wish?
Ju Le, do you think saying these things will soften me up? I'm telling you, I hate you more than anyone.
(In the nick of time, looks at Ju Le’s face, recalls what he just said, her heart suddenly softens, and she puts down the knife) I've gone soft, I won't kill you.
(In the nick of time, a tiny sense of mercy stirs in Luo's heart, but she suppresses it again) No, I can’t hesitate, this is the last chance to escape.

question: #question# How can Luo Qing discover her true innermost feelings at this moment?

dialog.content: (With a sinister smile, staring directly at Luo Qing) Kill me.
Zhu Le, don't blame me. (Stabs Zhu Le in the chest)
(Stares at Luo Qing in disbelief, bending over and trembling, unsteady) Sister, look at me. You've killed someone... hahahahahaha, you will always remember me, you can't forget me.
(Leaves the small room where she was imprisoned)
(Chuckling while holding his chest) Sister, you really can't bear to be without me.
Who can't bear to be without you? I just... I just don't want to kill! I'm not like you; I have a conscience! I... (gets pulled into an embrace) From now on, you better not scare me like that.
(With a hint of laughter in his voice, hugging tighter) Alright.

Jule finally realized that no matter how well he treated Luo Qing, he could never win her over. She was always on the verge of escaping or taking her own life. So Jule chained her hands and feet with iron shackles and installed countless cameras in the house to monitor her. Life in such a confined space drove Luo Qing mad, causing her to see Jule as her savior, never daring to escape again, ultimately becoming Jule's caged bird.
(Opens his eyes and looks at Luo Qing holding a knife, smiles instead of getting angry) Sister, stop messing around.
(Just as Zhu Le is about to speak, she smiles at him, spins the knife to her own neck) Do you think I wouldn't dare?
(Smile freezes, he lunges to snatch the knife) Luo Qing, do you even know what you're doing?
(Swiftly sidesteps, making him miss, retreats to the corner of the room, with the knife already at her neck) Let me go.
(Striving to remain calm, yet his voice still trembles) Impossible.
Aren't you afraid of me dying?
If you die, I'll go down with you. You can't escape.

content.content: Since there's no way out (glances at Zhu Le in front of her), spending a lifetime with him in the basement wouldn't be too bad (suddenly tosses the knife lightly) I was just kidding.
My love for you is no less than my desire for freedom, but if you love me that much, would you let me go? (Soft kisses fall beside Zhu Le's ear)
(Hugs Zhu Le) Since you love me so, let's be together forever in life and death. (Kills both herself and Zhu Le)
Ah, but it's too terrifying there. Why don't you go ahead and pave the way for me? (Turns the knife's handle and stabs it into Zhu Le's chest)

question: #question# How does Luo Qing adapt to a life imprisoned by Zhu Le?

content.content: Do you just want to keep me tied to your side forever? I can't stand these days anymore! (Eyes flash with madness, stabs the knife fiercely towards herself) In that case, let’s die together, so we can always be together.
Who are you trying to fool, am I really that important to you? I don't believe it. (Stabs the knife into herself)
Fine, you said it. Now keep your eyes open and watch closely (stabs the knife into herself), so will you... join me?
Even if I can't escape, I'll do my best to leave. Don't think you can trap me here. You won't dissuade me.

question: #question# How does Luo Qing express her unwillingness to be bound in the basement and stay with Zhu Le?

dialog.content: (Steps forward and kicks the knife away, embraces Luo Qing tightly, body trembling slightly) I knew it, I knew it, sister wouldn't die.
(Raises hand to gently embrace him back, pats softly, deepening smile, can't stop) Darling, how could I bear to die?

You love me so much that you can't wait to devour my marrow, crush my bones and swallow them whole, so we can become one, never to be apart in all eternity. Aren't I the same? Let's play a riddle game, shall we? Let's guess who's the hunter and who's the prey, who is the canary in whose cage? (In the end, the two forever stay together lovingly in the basement).
Luo Qing! Do you really want to die this much... Is this the outcome you desire?
That's right. Do you want to do it, or should I? Either way, let's die together, so we'll never be apart...
Yes, life has no meaning without you... (She stands in front of Luo Qing, her tone resolute) Kill me, then we can be together forever, even in death.
(Hiding a knife behind after dinner one day) Come give me a hug!
(Pauses for a moment, then opens his arms wide without any defense) What's up today? Why are you suddenly so affectionate?
(Jumps onto Zhu Le) What's wrong with being affectionate? Don't you want me to be a bit more affectionate towards you? (Pokes his face)
I like it, of course I do. It just feels a little bit odd.

(Before finishing speaking, pulls a knife out from his sleeve and forcefully stabs it into his back, jumps down decisively, and smiles at him) It seems like... I can't live without you anymore. Habits can truly be terrifying. As a reward, how about you and I stay together forever?
(Wakes up to find his hands bound by the chains that once restrained Luo Qing) As long as we don't part, I don't mind sinking together.

(Sleepily opens eyes, puts the knife back in the kitchen, locks it away, returns to the sofa and pulls Luo Qing into his arms, continuing to sleep) I will protect my sister really well, never letting her get hurt.
(Watching Zhu Le gradually fall asleep, inhaling his unique scent, tucking his hair behind his ear) Do you really think so...

Luo Qing gradually fell into Zhu Le's gentle embrace, becoming more reliant on him, forever abandoning the idea of escape. Later, Zhu Le grew to trust Luo Qing more and more, and together they stepped out of the prison gates.
(with a face full of resistance) But I hate carrot juice the most...
(shrugs) That's not my problem.
(frowns, takes a deep breath, pinches her nose and downs both bottles of carrot juice) Is this enough to please you, sister?
Luo Qing watched Zhu Le drink the carrot juice, feeling her heart touched in a tender place, she decided to stay by Zhu Le's side forever.
Sister, do you still remember me?
Of course I remember you, Zhule, the handsome little brother who lives next door. How could I forget? (caressing Zhule's chin)
Zhule was quite satisfied. Seeing how compliant Luo Qing appeared, he couldn’t help but trust her a bit more. In the end, Luo Qing used Zhule's trust to escape from here.
